name: A Midnight Racer Pro - Top High Speed Car Racing Game
name_original: A Midnight Racer Pro - Top High Speed Car Racing Game
description:
The Race is on! Get ready for the Ride of your Life! You have 30 seconds to put the pedal to the metal and speed across the City Bridge to outrun the law. Have you got what it takes? Speed your way through the traffic lanes along with an awesome pulsing Drum n Base Sound Track.

Ramp up your speed in this ultimate night race against the clock, mind who you’re barging out of the way or you will suffer penalties off your time. Pick up time tokens to extend your play by crucial seconds, grab the cash and clock up those points to get onto the score board. Can you get to first place and stay there?

Game Features:

- Ultimate Night Speed racing
- Cool 3D Graphics
- Smooth Tilt to Steer Game Play
- Pick up Time Tokens for extra crucial Seconds
- Grab the Cash and stay top of the Scoreboard
- Awesome Drum n Base Sound Track
- Connect to Game Center
